name: Nyctophobia (itch) (TheJohnyFeeD)
description:
Nyctophobia is a top-down survival horror. The player will have to move deeper and deeper through the dark basement, fighting disgusting monsters using his ingenuity and a very limited arsenal of weapons and ammunition.

WARNING: This game contains strong language, scenes of violence and suicide related scenes. You have been warned. I don't want to hurt anyone with my game.

Note: There are two versions of the game - fixed, and, well, not fixed. The difference between them is that the fixed version is shorter, and it has a few bug fixed (e.g. player not being able to reload a shotgun or enemies walking through the walls).

Music by: Kevin Macleod, Darren Curtis
